ratified.name: EXT_texture_filter_anisotropic

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebGL working group

features.feature: The getTexParameter, texParameterf and texParameteri entry points' parameter pname accepts the value TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT
The getParameter entry point parameter pname accepts the value MAX_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT, returning a value of type float.

revision.change: Added the EXT suffix to the enumerants and aliases to the extension name
Moved from draft to community approved status
